<code>'''mptestlevels.zip'''</code> is a pack of ''[[Java Edition]]'' worlds uploaded by [[Notch]] on [[minecraft.net]] and shared in the #minecraft chat on irc.esper.net on June 8, 2009.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(21:03:56) <@Notch> http://www.minecraft.net/mptestlevels.zip"</ref> It contains the worlds used in Notch's test server during the [[Java Edition Multiplayer Test|Classic Multiplayer Test]],<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]:  "<Eagle> Notch what is "mptestlevels.zip" for"<br>
"(21:04:53) <Eagle> ?"<br>[...]<br>
"(21:05:09) <@Notch> those are all the servers from the mp tests"<br>
"(21:05:16) <@Notch> so you can run them on your own servers if you want. <nowiki>=</nowiki>)"</ref> before the public release of the [[Java Edition Classic server 1.0|Classic server software]]. The levels contained within appear to be numbered from oldest to latest used.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(21:05:34) <Empty> Notch what was the latest one?"<br>[...]<br>"(21:06:57) <@Notch> the one with the highest number"</ref> The exact contents of this pack are unknown, as the file has not been archived and is currently lost.
